plot outline: Vikra,.Areena,Jahanasheen and Bobby enter a bungalow to steal paintings but due to some paranormal activity they get trapped inside the painting and reach the place in reality where paintings belongs .Raunak wakes up to see that all four are trapped inside a painting but soon realizes that they have shuffled to another painting and Jahanasheen is missing among the four,Raunak soon realizes that her lover Veer whose behind the paintings is also missing and takes help of women known to have paranormal powers.Raunak starts to tell her the events before Veer went missing it will unfold a mystery about paintings and Veer's disappearance.
title: Tera Intezaar
plot: A woman sets out to uncover how her lover went missing.

Vikra,.Areena,Jahanasheen and Bobby enter a bungalow to steal paintings but due to some paranormal activity they get trapped inside the painting and reach the place in reality where paintings belongs .Raunak wakes up to see that all four are trapped inside a painting but soon realizes that they have shuffled to another painting and Jahanasheen is missing among the four,Raunak soon realizes that her lover Veer whose behind the paintings is also missing and takes help of women known to have paranormal powers.Raunak starts to tell her the events before Veer went missing it will unfold a mystery about paintings and Veer's disappearance.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
